article_title: What Uber And Apple Can Teach Us About Fixing Health Care

article_metadata.author: Glen Tullman

og.description: It’s easy to think that Uber's pitched battle with entrenched cab companies is a classic microcosm of technological disruption.  Not so. Rather, it speaks to a more powerful and enduring truth: Technology doesn’t force revolutionary change, consumers do. Uber came along with a better way to get around in cities. Rather [...]
